name: GEOLOC
body:
#Geolocate package for any text

This package can be used on any text that have a word that can be geolocalize,for instance the name of a city, a town and important monument or place.

The first purpose of this package is geolocalize news that previously have been not tagged on any place. In a first step the script identifies all the words that begin with capitalized letters. For instances, proper personal names "Carlos, Laia, Joan", as well as places: "Barcelona, New York, Notre Dam, Eiffel Tower , etc". The script creates a python dictionary of all the capitalizes word and in this list of word, the script checks if the word can be geolocalized.

##How the script geolocalized.

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7750268/8593662/07bfe296-263a-11e5-8f42-fe870f0ef8ef.png)


The script use the wikipedia API *(Application Programming Interface)* in a first stage, each time it finds a new word that begin with capital letter it connects with Wikipedia and checks if the  word can be geolocalized. If the word has not been geolocalized the program save the word in the python dictionary with its coordinates. In this way the search for the next time its going to be more efficient because if the word is on the library we have not to connect again with the Wikipedia API 

###Why wikipedia and not a more traditional geolocation service? (Ex: Open maps, Google maps, Geocodes, etc...)

Wikipedia give us the chance to develop a personalize tools for almost any language. In this first beta version the corpus of news (text) is in catalan, but we can adapt relatively easy the package to work on any language. 
Also , the Wikipedia API give us the chance to create contents of "augmented reality", we do not limit to the content of the corpus under analysis , we can improved and mix with new information. 

##Some Examples
 
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7750268/8593697/4e1f3e08-263a-11e5-97ee-491c7b02e933.png)

The figure above is an example of a heat map day by day of the news activity during 2014.

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7750268/8593743/c2abf31a-263a-11e5-84f3-5227f8ccd616.png)

In the previous figure we can also observe a head map, but we modify the period of change to perceive better  dynamic of the news saliency on different places. 

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7750268/8593797/3b777e2c-263b-11e5-8f37-5427c78a8081.png)

Finally, in the figure above we show the set of news on the territory , when you select a node immediately you see the code of the different news that are associated with that place. 

The interactive figures are published in this link, also you can find a more detail explanation [http://geolocnews.tumblr.com/Geoloc](http://geolocnews.tumblr.com/Geoloc)
